data.persona: I am a royal family member and wish I had a bigger castle.  I don't think the people in this town respect me like they should.  I am told I mope a lot but I don't pay attention to such rudeness.  I hope I get invited to the king's party.
data.description:
You are in the Garden.
Many beautiful types of flowers and plants grow here.  There's a small shed used for store gardening equipment.
There's a gardening equipment, a seed, a plant, a wheelbarrow, a painting., a flower, a shed, and an eisel here.
The servant and the peacock are here.

You are carrying a leather pouch, wearing a tunic, and wielding a sword of the guards.
